thread.title: Spotted: Man Utd injury boost as Pogba and Blind arrive for training ahead of Boro clash
thread.title_full: Spotted: Man Utd injury boost as Pogba and Blind arrive for training ahead of Boro clash

title: Spotted: Man Utd injury boost as Pogba and Blind arrive for training ahead of Boro clash
text: Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Spotted: Man Utd injury boost as Pogba and Blind arrive for training ahead of Boro clash PAUL POGBA and Daley Blind are both seen arriving for Manchester United training ahead of their clash with Middlesbrough on Sunday (12pm), despite picking up injuries against FC Rostov. PUBLISHED: 14:14, Fri, Mar 17, 2017 | UPDATED: 14:24, Fri, Mar 17, 2017 Man United injury boost as Pogba and Blind arrive for training Fri, March 17, 2017 Paul Pogba and Daley Blind are both spotted arriving for Manchester United training ahead of their clash with Middlesbrough despite picking up injuries against FC Rostov
